transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: I’m sorry to hear about the billing issue you’re experiencing tonight. I’ve created a support ticket (Ticket #45782) and forwarded it to our billing team. They will review your account and send you a resolution update within the next 24 hours.

script: I’m sorry to hear about the billing issue you’re experiencing tonight. I’ve created a support ticket (Ticket #45782) and forwarded it to our billing team. They will review your account and send you a resolution update within the next 24 hours.
